name: Habib Saikal
story: Abdul-Basir Fahim grew up in a small village in Afghanistan. He showed exceptional marksmanship skills at a young age and was eventually recruited by the Taliban. After a few years, government forces managed to capture him and he was given the option to either serve out his sentence or join the OPFOR. Abdul-Basir chose the latter, hoping to use his skills for the benefit of his country and people.
